cyclone.name: BILL
cyclone.current_location: about 55 miles SE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the central Texas coast

weather_observation.warning_coast: Baffin Bay to High Island Texas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Texas coast from Baffin Bay northward to High Island (central and upper Texas coast)
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions with occasional gusts 25â€“35 mph possible; sustained tropical-storm-force winds unlikely.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge less than 1 ft along the lower Texas coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to moderate rain (generally <2 inches); heaviest totals expected well north of Brownsville.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Rip currents and isolated squalls from outer rain bands.
